reviewText: I do love this show . it is very uplifting and purposeful and I watch it over and over again
Title: Touched By An Angel: Season 4

reviewText: I am one of those people that love sappy endings. I also love it when the good guys win, when the underdogs triumph, and when people are reminded that God does indeed exist--even if at times it all feels like hocus pocus. But, I am also one of those people who likes good acting and sadly, there are many Christian films that lack good actors. That, however, is not the case when it comes to Touched By An Angel--regardless of the season you choose to watch. The episodes are heart-wrenching, and they remind you that there really is a God out there waiting with loving arms to comfort you.
Title: Touched By An Angel: Season 4

reviewText: This series were a triumph to common sense ethics in human behavior.Excellently written, acted and directed. I wish it would have continued for 10 more years.
Title: Touched By An Angel: Season 4

reviewText: Other tv shows are being pumped out in record time while TBAA is held back. I've looked at the pages of reviews here and have to believe there is a huge market for the show. I have the first four seasons and would like to purchase all the rest of the seasons. Where are they? Amazon doesn't even have a pre-order set up for season five...which makes me wonder if we have seen the last of this great series. I hope not, but it's looking that way. Having the seasons split in half is a pain, but not having them at all will be even worse. Please, folks, for once do the right thing; put the last seven seasons out!
summary: Where oh where is season five???????
Title: Touched By An Angel: Season 4

reviewText: The fourth season copes with vast variety of situations. There is no difference of gender, race or religion. As a Jewish woman I found a new perspective of our morning prayers in the episode Jones Vs. God. The prayer of Shema Israel was emphasized in Elijah. Some of the episodes were extremely moving. But I've changed my point of view about dealing with evil: I was inspired to change my attitude towards vicious people in my life. I recommend purchasing the fourth season of Touched By An Angel because it deals with difficult problems and presents sins that usually people think that are unredeemed; however, the angels always comfort the people and bring them a message of hope and the love of God.
Title: Touched By An Angel: Season 4

reviewText: Loved this series and hope another will rise.  Would be nice to see additional episodes for purchase.
Title: Touched By An Angel: Season 4

reviewText: I am so sorry that these fantastic stories are no longer on T.V. I would advise everyone to buy these as they speak of truth. In a world full of so much hatred and evil, these movies shows us that there is hope, and wonderful love that is given to each of us if we will just open our hearts and let Him come in. I give this item TEN stars. They are movies you will watch over and over again! I hope to be able to get the entire series, they are movies I will never tire of watching!
Title: Touched By An Angel: Season 4

reviewText: If you haven't seen Touched by an Angel before, then I recommend not only the fourth season, but all seasons. This season has some of the best episodes in the series. It's a must have for family movie people and especially christians. It's a series that is sure to touch the hearts of millions.

reviewText: This show is one of my favorite series of all time!! (my other favs being murder, she wrote, hercules, and babylon 5)I so hope you guys make all 10 seasons available! one of the worst things was for CBS to cancel this series(not they're first mistake in my opinion), it was and still is loved by millions of people(I know many others who agree with me)  I cannot wait to own all the seasons!!
Title: Touched By An Angel: Season 4

reviewText: This is a wonderful FAMILY tv show to watch.  We now own every volume that has been released and will purchase more if they ever release them!  It is a great way to wind down on a Saturday or Sunday night.  Too bad they took such a high quality show of the TV and replaced it with garbage!  Buy this DVD collection and share it with your family.  You will be blessed and so will they.
Title: Touched By An Angel: Season 4

reviewText: I love it. It's so different. I wish all people could watch it. It's good for family, for everybody. I enjoy to watch this angels: Tess and Monica doing their job.
